summary: This document is a U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) automated email notification indicating that a law enforcement user at ICE-PHILADELPHIA performed a Person Lookout Query on Ghislaine Maxwell on August 5, 2022. It shows continued law enforcement interest and database monitoring of Maxwell following her conviction.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual whose record was accessed in a Person Lookout Query by an ICE user in Philadelphia.

persons.name: Kimberly R. Meder
persons.context: FBI agent in New York who was the recipient of the automated email notification about the query hit on Ghislaine Maxwell.

connections.description: Meder, an FBI agent, was notified of a law enforcement database query performed on Maxwell's record.

events.title: Law Enforcement Query on Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A Person Lookout Query was performed on Ghislaine Maxwell's record by a user at ICE-PHILADELPHIA, triggering an automated notification to the FBI.

locations: New York (NY) - inferred from recipient's location
keyFacts: A Person Lookout Query was performed on Ghislaine Maxwell's record on August 5, 2022.
The query was executed by a user at ICE-PHILADELPHIA (Immigration and Customs Enforcement).
An automated notification of this query hit was sent to FBI agent Kimberly R. Meder in New York.
The document indicates continued law enforcement system monitoring of Maxwell post-conviction.
The query was identified by the record number P3O92965500A01 and TECSID P3O92965500A0I.
